languages.text: At the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: At the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all creatures in a 2-cells radius suffer the bloodblight {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effect{/g}. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 direct damage and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

At the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

At the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，2格内所有生物都会受到“血疫”效果影响。当受到“血疫”效果影响的生物受到冲击、穿刺或{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}时，还会额外受到4点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，并承受{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（4）效果。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，2格内所有生物都会受到“血疫”{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}效果{/g}影响。当受到“血疫”效果影响的生物受到冲击、穿刺或{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}时，还会额外受到4点直击伤害，并承受{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（4）效果。

languages.text: В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} все существа в радиусе 2 клеток получают эффект "заражение крови". Получая ударный, пронзающий или {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g}, они также получают +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} дополнительно и эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} (4).
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} все существа в радиусе 2 клеток получают {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}эффект{/g} "заражение крови". Получая {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}ударный{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающий{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g}, они также получают +4 прямого урона дополнительно и эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} (4).

В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} все существа в радиусе 2 клеток получают {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}эффект{/g} "заражение крови". Получая {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}ударный{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающий{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g}, они также получают +4 прямого урона дополнительно и эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} (4).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、周囲2セル以内の全ての生物はブラッドブライトの効果を受ける。これらの生物が衝撃、貫通、または{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を受けた場合、さらに+4の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(4)を受ける
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、周囲2セル以内の全ての生物はブラッドブライトの{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}効果{/g}を受ける。これらの生物が衝撃、貫通、または{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を受けた場合、さらに＋4の直接ダメージと{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(4)を受ける。

languages.text: Al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, todas las criaturas en un radio de 2 casillas sufren el efecto sangre maldita. Si esas criaturas sufren {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g}, de impacto o perforante, también sufren +4 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (4).
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: Al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, todas las criaturas en un radio de 2 casillas sufren el {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto{/g} sangre maldita. Si esas criaturas sufren {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g}, de impacto o perforante, también sufren +4 de daño directo y {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (4).

languages.text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} werden alle Kreaturen in einem Radius von 2 Feldern mit dem Blutrausch-Effekt belegt. Wenn diese Kreaturen Schlag-, Durchdringungs- oder {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g} erleiden, wird ihnen zusätzlich +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (4) hinzugefügt.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} erleiden alle Kreaturen in einem 2-Felder-Radius den Blutrausch-{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}Effekt{/g}. Wenn diese Kreaturen Aufprall-, Durchdringungs- oder {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g} erleiden, wird ihnen zusätzlich +4 Direktschaden und {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (4) hinzugefügt.

languages.text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, toutes les créatures présentes dans un rayon de 2 cases subissent l'effet Fléau sanglant. Si ces créatures subissent des dégâts d'impact, des dégâts perforants ou des {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts de lacération{/g}, elles subissent également +4 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} supplémentaires et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (4).
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, toutes les créatures présentes dans un rayon de 2 cases subissent l'{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet{/g} Fléau Sanglant. Si ces créatures subissent des dégâts d'impact, des dégâts perçants ou des {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts perforants{/g}, elles subissent également +4 points de dégâts directs supplémentaires et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (4).
